column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Arnook says : " Tonight , we celebrate the arrival of our brother and sister from the Southern Tribe .
#Text=May the great Ocean and Moon Spirits watch over us during these troubled times !
#Text=" Arnook says : " Now , Master Pakku and his students will perform !
#Text=" Sokka says : " Hi there .
#Text=Sokka , Southern Water Tribe .
#Text=" Yue says : " Very nice to meet you .
#Text=" Sokka says : " So ... uhhh ... you 're a princess , huh ?
#Text=You know , back in my tribe , I 'm kind of like a prince , myself .
#Text=" Katara says : " Ha , prince of what ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " A lot of things !
#Text=Do you mind ?
#Text=I 'm trying to have a conversation here .
#Text=" Katara says : " My apologies , Prince Sokka .
#Text=" Sokka says : " So , it looks like I 'm going to be in town for a while .
#Text=I 'm thinking ... maybe we could ... do an activity , together ?
#Text=" Yue says : " Do an activity ?
#Text=" Katara says : " Very smooth ... "
